page.title: 07Carnival 1985
page.content: The Carnival procession consisted of several floats decorated by community groups,fancy dress contestants and marching bands.It was led by the carnival queens'float.They were judged by local dignitaries including Miss Ashfield and George Stafford,the Black Pudding King. The main attraction this year was the Ultra Quiz organized by Graham Percy of Radio Nottingham.The prize of a holiday in Jersey was won by a man from Underwood. Other attractions included a display by the Brinsley School of Dancing,a football match,several marching bands,a gymnastics display and a dog show. The carnival was a great success.We have a carnival partly because of the enjoyment and to generate community spirit and to raise money for charity.
